org.apache.ddlutils.alteration
Interface ForeignKeyChange

All Superinterfaces:
ModelChange, TableChange
All Known Implementing Classes:
ForeignKeyChangeImplBase, RemoveForeignKeyChange
public interface ForeignKeyChange
extends TableChange

Represents a change to a foreign key of a table.

Version:
$Revision: $

Method Summary
 ForeignKey findChangedForeignKey(Database model, boolean caseSensitive)
          Finds the foreign key object corresponding to the changed foreign key in the given database model.

Method Detail

findChangedForeignKey

ForeignKey findChangedForeignKey(Database model,
                                 boolean caseSensitive)
Finds the foreign key object corresponding to the changed foreign key in the given database model.

Parameters:
model - The database model
caseSensitive - Whether identifiers are case sensitive
Returns:
The foreign key object or null if it could not be found
